t: Amazon to scrap its Go Grocery store branding, close Redmond location | The Seattle Times
s: May 19, 2021 - Amazon is ditching the Amazon Go Grocery brand, closing one of its two Go Grocery stores and rechristening the other under its Amazon Fresh label, a move intended to reduce confusion about its multiple grocery brands.
